players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked Diana was killed. Who do others think is suspicious?"
Charlie: "I believe Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation. We should vote for her."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Diana last night? Your claim makes no sense."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. Her doubt is just deflection; we must vote her out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why investigate me instead of the obvious first-night kill target? You're fabricating this investigation to get me voted out."
Bob: "I think Charlie's claim makes sense; we should vote for Alice to protect the town."
